comments.author: Simon80@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20110430 Firefox/4.0.1 Iceweasel/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20110430 Firefox/4.0.1 Iceweasel/4.0.1

After triggering this bug by attempting to drag a folder from the Bookmarks Toolbar's overflow menu, dragging ceases to function permanently for all areas of the UI, such as dragging tabs, bookmarks, page elements, or UI widgets in customization mode.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Fill your bookmarks toolbar items widget until it overflows on the right
2. Open the overflow menu
3. try to drag around folders (NOT files) until a drag fails to work

Actual Results:  
A drag fails to work, and then dragging globally ceases to work throughout the application.

Expected Results:  
Dragging just works.

comments.author: jstutte@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Bulk-downgrade of unassigned, >=5 years untouched DOM/Storage bugs' priority.

If you have reason to believe this is wrong (especially for the severity), please write a comment and ni :jstutte.
